ing: 1 (.75 ounce) packet dry mushroom gravy mix
n: Smoked Sausage in Mushroom Wine Gravy
des: "This is a very easy, quick recipe created out of desperation for my hungry family: smoked sausage (or kielbasa) sliced up with mushrooms in a red wine gravy. Basic fare, but everyone seems to love it! Serve up with mashed potatoes and corn."
ins: In a saucepan, stir together the gravy mix, red wine, and water. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly. Reduce heat, and simmer 1 minute. Mix in the sausage and mushrooms. Season with pepper. Continue to simmer until heated through.
